meanings.definition: To draw more than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: She outdraws her friends in art class.
meanings.sent2: The champion archer always outdraws his opponents.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel outdraws the big bear in gathering nuts.
meanings.sent4: His determination outdraws any obstacles in his path.
meanings.sent5: The sun outdraws the moon in brightness.

meanings.sent1: The new artist outdraws the experienced painter with her unique style.
meanings.sent2: His talent outdraws all others in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The child's imagination outdraws reality in his colorful drawings.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for art outdraws any doubts about her skills.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of nature outdraws any man-made creation.
